languages.text: "Когда он выбрался из лап эскулапов — а произошло это спустя месяцы после покушения — то похмыкивал что-то о том, что ловкая девчонка оказалась. И что она на него сильно обижена была за то, как он поджарил ее то ли отца, то ли жениха... который был капитаном корабля. Я помню смутно этот разговор, но почти уверен, что корабль тот назывался "Покаяние". И что Денз даже знал имя того капитана и благородной мстительницы. Женщину звали Леона или что-то вроде, а вот фамилия... Я не удивлюсь, если звучала она как "Фиделио".

traits.locale_text: "Когда он выбрался из лап эскулапов — а произошло это спустя месяцы после покушения — то похмыкивал что-то о том, что ловкая девчонка оказалась. И что она на него сильно обижена была за то, как он поджарил ее то ли отца, то ли жениха... который был капитаном корабля. Я помню смутно этот разговор, но почти уверен, что корабль тот назывался "Покаяние". И что Денз даже знал имя того капитана и благородной мстительницы. Женщину звали Леона или что-то вроде, а вот фамилия... Я не удивлюсь, если звучала она как "Фиделио".

languages.text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Когда он выбрался из лап эскулапов — а произошло это спустя месяцы после покушения — то похмыкивал что-то о том, что ловкая девчонка оказалась. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

languages.text: “当他终于不用再挨外科医生的骨锯时，那已经是几个月之后的事情了。他当时哈哈大笑，说那个女人可真带劲。还说她真的气坏了，因为他烧死了她的舰长丈夫，还是她的舰长父亲来着，我记不太清了……当时具体的话我记不太清了，但我差不多可以确定，那艘船的名字就叫‘忏悔号’。而且，丹兹似乎知道那个舰长的名字，还有那位高傲的复仇者的名字。那个女人的名字好像是叫蕾欧娜，至于她的姓氏……如果听起来和‘菲迪奥’很像的话，恐怕我一点都不会觉得意外。”
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: “当他终于不用再挨外科医生的骨锯时，那已经是几个月之后的事情了。他当时哈哈大笑，说那个女人可真带劲。还说她真的气坏了，因为他烧死了她的舰长丈夫，还是她的舰长父亲来着，我记不太清了……当时具体的话我记不太清了，但我差不多可以确定，那艘船的名字就叫‘忏悔号’。而且，丹兹似乎知道那个舰长的名字，还有那位高傲的复仇者的名字。那个女人的名字好像是叫蕾欧娜，至于她的姓氏……如果听起来和‘菲迪奥’很像的话，恐怕我一点都不会觉得意外。”

languages.text: «Cuando por fin volvió de manos de los matasanos, meses después del intento de asesinato, no dejaba de comentar entre risas que era muy lista y que estaba muy cabreada con él por haber incinerado a su padre o a su marido; no me acuerdo... que era un capitán de nave. Solo tengo recuerdos vagos de esa conversación, pero estoy convencido de que esa nave se llamaba Arrepentimiento. Y de que Denz sabía hasta los nombres del capitán y de su orgullosa vengadora. La mujer se llamaba Leona o algo por el estilo, y su apellido... no me sorprendería si fuera algo parecido a Fidelio».
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

Solo tengo recuerdos vagos de esa conversación, pero estoy convencido de que esa nave se llamaba Arrepentimiento. Y de que Denz sabía hasta los nombres del capitán y de su orgullosa vengadora. La mujer se llamaba Leona o algo por el estilo, y su apellido... no me sorprendería si fuera algo parecido a Fidelio».

languages.text: 「ようやく身体をまともに動かせるようになったのは、暗殺未遂から数ヶ月後の話です。彼はアサシンの女を切れ者と呼び、思い出し笑いを繰り返していました。そして彼女は、自分の父親か夫だかを燃やしたことで、彼を心底恨んでいたとか…彼はとある船の船長だったのです。当時の会話はうろ覚えですが、確かその船の名前がリペンタンスだった気がします。デンツはその船長と、誇り高き復讐者となるその女の名前まで知っていました。彼女の名前はレオナだった気がしますが、名字は失念してしまいました…それが『フィデリオ』に似ていたとしても、驚きはしません」
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやく身体をまともに動かせるようになったのは、暗殺未遂から数ヶ月後の話です。彼はアサシンの女を切れ者と呼び、思い出し笑いを繰り返していました。そして彼女は、自分の父親か夫だかを燃やしたことで、彼を心底恨んでいたとか…彼はとある船の船長だったのです。当時の会話はうろ覚えですが、確かその船の名前がリペンタンスだった気がします。デンツはその船長と、誇り高き復讐者となるその女の名前まで知っていました。彼女の名前はレオナだった気がしますが、名字は失念してしまいました…それが『フィデリオ』に似ていたとしても、驚きはしません」

languages.text: "Als ihn die Knochensäger schließlich wieder entließen – Monate nach dem Anschlag –, kicherte er, sie sei ganz schön scharf gewesen. Und dass sie wütend auf ihn war, weil er ihren Vater verbrannt hatte oder ihren Ehemann, ich weiß es nicht mehr ... und dass er ein Schiffscaptain gewesen war. Ich erinnere mich nur vage an dieses Gespräch, aber ich bin fast sicher, dass das Schiff Repentanz hieß. Und dass Denz sogar die Namen des Captains und der Möchtegern-Rächerin kannte. Die Frau hieß Leona oder so ähnlich, und ihr Nachname ... Es würde mich nicht überraschen, wenn er so ähnlich klang wie Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Als ihn die Knochensäger schließlich wieder entließen – Monate nach dem Anschlag –, kicherte er, sie sie ganz schön scharf gewesen. Und dass sie wütend auf ihn war, weil er ihren Vater verbrannt hatte oder ihren Ehemann, ich weiß es nicht mehr ... und dass er ein Schiffscaptain gewesen war. Ich erinnere mich nur vage an dieses Gespräch, aber ich bin fast sicher, dass das Schiff Repentanz hieß. Und dass Denz sogar die Namen des Captains und der Möchtegern-Rächerin kannte. Die Frau hieß Leona oder so ähnlich, und ihr Nachname ... Es würde mich nicht überraschen, wenn er so ähnlich klang wie Fidelio."

languages.text: « Quand, des mois après la tentative d'assassinat, il est enfin sorti des mains des chirurgiens, il n'arrêtait pas de dire qu'elle était très maline. Et ça le faisait rire ! À ses dires, elle le haïssait pour avoir brûlé son père – ou son mari, je ne sais plus – qui était capitaine d'un vaisseau. Je ne me rappelle pas tous les détails de cette conversation, mais je suis presque sûr que le vaisseau se nommait le Repentance. Denz connaissait même le nom du capitaine et de celle qui s'était juré de le venger. La femme s'appelait Léona, ou quelque chose dans le genre, et son nom de famille... Ma foi, je ne serais pas surpris que ce soit dans la veine de Fidélio. »
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: « Quand, des mois après la tentative d'assassinat, il est enfin sorti des mains des chirurgiens, il n'arrêtait pas de dire qu'elle était très maline. Et ça le faisait rire ! À ses dires, elle le haïssait pour avoir brûlé son père – ou son mari, je ne sais plus – qui était capitaine d'un vaisseau. Je ne me rappelle pas tous les détails de cette conversation, mais je suis presque sûr que le vaisseau se nommait le Repentance. Denz connaissait même le nom du capitaine et de celle qui s'était juré de le venger. La femme s'appelait Léona, ou quelque chose dans le genre, et son nom de famille... Ma foi, je ne serais pas surpris que ce soit dans la veine de Fidélio. »

languages.text: "Suikast girişiminin üstünden aylar geçip de nihayet ayağa kalkabildiğinde, suikastçının ne kadar keskin zekâlı olduğundan bahsedip gülüyordu devamlı. Ayrıca kadın, babasını mı kocasını mı ne yaktığı için acayip kızgınmış. Adam bir geminin kaptanıymış. Konuşmaları hayal meyal hatırlasam da geminin adının Tövbe olduğundan neredeyse adım kadar eminim. Denz, o kaptanın ve mağrur sözde intikamcının adlarını bile biliyordu. Kadının adı Leona gibi bir şeydi, soyadı da... Fidelio deseler şaşırmam."
languages.original_text: "When he finally emerged from the hands of the sawbones — months after the attempted assassination — he kept chuckling about her being a sharp one. And that she was real angry with him for burning her father, or her husband, I don't recall... and he was a ship captain. I vaguely remember that conversation, but I'm almost certain that the ship was called the Repentance. And that Denz even knew the names of that captain and the proud would-be avenger. The woman's name was Leona or something like that, and her last name... I wouldn't be surprised if it sounded similar to Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Suikast girişiminin üzerinden aylar geçip de sonunda iki ayağı üstünde durabildiğinde, suikastçının ne kadar kurnaz olduğundan bahsedip durdu. Tam hatırlamıyorum ama kadın, Denz'e babasını veya kocasını yaktığı için çok kızgınmış. Adam bir geminin kaptanıymış. Bu konuşmayı hayal meyal hatırlıyorum ama geminin adının Tövbe olduğuna neredeyse adım kadar eminim. Denz o kaptanın ve mağrur sözde intikamcının adlarını bile biliyordu. Kadının adı Leona gibi bir şeydi, soyadı da... Fidelio deseler şaşırmam."
